append.value: engine=innodb character set utf8 collate utf8_bin

changeSet.author: Van Mittal-Henkle
changeSet.sql: insert into customized_text(original_text, custom_text) select concat(lookup_entity.entity_name, ".Label"), lookup_label.entity_name from lookup_label lookup_label, lookup_entity lookup_entity where lookup_label.entity_id = lookup_entity.entity_id and lookup_label.entity_name is not null and not lookup_entity.entity_name like 'CustomField%';

rollback.sql: delete from customized_text where original_text like '%.Label';
